snippet: A Norwegian court on Thursday convicted a Rwandan man, Sadi Bugingo, living in Norway for participating in the 1994 genocide in Rwanda and sentenced him to 21 years in prison.
abstract: Norwegian court convicts Sadi Bugingo, Rwandan man living in Norway, for participating in 1994 genocide in Rwanda and sentences him to 21 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A Norwegian court on Thursday convicted a Rwandan man, Sadi Bugingo, living in Norway for participating in the 1994 genocide in Rwanda and sentenced him to 21 years in prison.

headline.main: Norway: Rwandan Convicted for His Role in 1994 Genocide
headline.print_headline: Norway: Rwandan Convicted For His Role in 1994 Genocide
